name: DeepDiver
description:
DEEP DIVER

You have been sent on a mission to explore the deepest depths of the ocean. Your goal is to reach the bottom of the ocean. You can upgrade and refill your oxygen tank and flippers at the upgrade stations on the surface. But its not free! You have to earn money from selling various fish and goods you find underwater. Beware of the some of the fish in the ocean, not all of them are friendly! Good luck!
